item.description:
RSVP to obtain participation info: http://simplydoit.net/RSVPtoWebinar

---------------------------------------------------------

  • What is a Land Trust?
  • Why do I need to use Land Trusts?
  • Land Trusts: Many Benefits
  • Privacy and Asset Protection Aspects of Land Trust
  • What attorneys do not know about Land Trusts?
  • Do Land Trusts "work" in your state?

 

About the Speaker

Randy Hughes, or better known as Mr. Land Trust, has purchased over 200 houses since 1969 and is a full time real estate investor. He has lived the life of having nothing and will not let that happen again. Randy teaches real estate investment courses throughout the United States. He has written Privacy and Asset Protection books as well as home study courses. Randy’s most popular publications are his Land Trust Made Simple home study courses and live seminars. Randy teaches real estate investors how to set up and administer their own land trusts for privacy, asset protection, and profits. He is known nationally as THE expert on the use of Land Trusts for investors.

Randy has written extensively for local and national real estate publications. He has taught real estate classes at the University of Illinois, Parkland College and Elgin Community College. Randy has been a licensed Continuing Education Instructor for the Illinois Association of Realtors for 20 years. He also speaks to real estate investment clubs throughout the United States.

---------------------------------------------------------

item.name: Why & Who Needs a Land Trust? Webinar
